text: alright one of the most popular Asian

door and the most popular dish there is

pretty close to what you're going to get

cups

so I really hope you try to find that or
at least get it on the internet but
you'll find it you'll find it this is
rice vinegar just regular rice vinegar

high heat don't be scared you can't
really burn it see it's going to start
to get like a nice mahogany color to

on there that's what you want so again
you be the judge of how far to go you

looking pretty good
